Package com.topright.roboticon

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIPlayerTestCase
    Test case for AIPlayer
    ButtonWithIcon
    Buttons that use given background images (one for the default state and one for the clicked state)
    ButtonWithIconTestCase
    Test case for the ButtonWithIcon class
    BuyRoboticonsMarket
    The window that allows players to buy roboticons from the market
    BuyRoboticonsMarketTestCase
    Test case for the BuyRoboticonsMarket class
    CreatePlots
    Contains a single static method that can be used to create and initialise a 2D array of plots of a given size.
    CreatePlotsTestCase
    Test case for the CreatePlots class
    CustomiseRoboticonMarketTestCase
    Test case for the CustomiseRoboticonsMarket class
    CustomiseRoboticonsMarket
    The window that players can use to customise their roboticons
    GameOverWindow
    Popup Window used to inform the player as to who has won (and display all player's scores)
    GameOverWindowTestCase
    Test case for the GameOverWindow class
    GuiTest
    Base class that is extended by all classes that wish to test LibGDX components Obtained from: http://manabreak.eu/java/2016/10/21/unittesting-libgdx.html (and then modified to suit our needs)
    Inventory
    Generic inventory class that can keep track of the quantity of ore and energy held.
    InventoryTestCase
    Test case for Inventory
    Main
    Sets up the various stages of the game and the GUI
    Market
    A singleton class used to manage the market allowing players to buy and sell resources to and from the market, buy roboticons and pay to have their roboticons customised
    MarketIntegrationTests
    Integration tests for the Market and MarketInventory classes
    MarketInventory
    A data structure used to keep track of the market's inventory.
    MarketInventoryTestCase
    Test case for MarketInventory
    MarketTestCase
    Test case for the Market class
    MenuBar
    A menu bar widget that is placed at the top of the screen
    MenuBarTestCase
    Test case for the MenuBar class
    MessagePopUp
    A pop up window that can be used to display a message to the user
    MessagePopUpTestcase
    Test case for the MessagePopUp class We are unable to test whether it opens in the middle of the screen due to limitations with the headless backend for LibGDX that we are using to perform these tests.
    Player
    Class to store all player attributes (including their inventory) and handle the buying and selling of resources and the buying and customisation of roboticons
    PlayerIntegrationTests
    Integration tests involving Player PlayerInventory Market MarketInventory Plot
    PlayerInventory
    A data structure to store the contents of a player's inventory.
    PlayerInventoryTestCase
    Test case for the PlayerInventory class
    PlayerTestCase
    Test case for Player
    Plot
    Stores the information required by a plot and provides the methods necessary to perform any actions that the plot needs to perform
    PlotIntegrationTests
    Test case for the Plot class
    PlotManager
    Manages all the plots and allows Players (both AI and human) to acquire plots and place roboticons on them
    PlotManagerTestCase
    Test case for the PlotManger class]
    PlotTestCase
    Test case for the Plot class
    PopUpWindow
    Base class to be used for the market window and game over window classes (any pop up window that should not behave like MessagePopUp)
    ResourceMarket
    A window that players can use to buy and sell resources to and from the market
    ResourceMarketTestcase
    Test case for the ResourceMarket class
    RoboticonPlaceMenu
    A window containing a menu that players can use to customise their roboticons
    SpinBox
    A SpinBox widget that users can use to select an integer value that lies within an allowed range
    SpinBoxTestCase
    Test case for the SpinBox class
